scripts.start:one: npm run config:one && cross-env BRAND=one ng run ng-dynamic-brand-ssr:serve
scripts.build:one: npm run config:one && cross-env BRAND=one ng run ng-dynamic-brand-ssr:build
scripts.dev:ssr:one: npm run config:one && cross-env BRAND=one ng run ng-dynamic-brand-ssr:serve-ssr
scripts.build:ssr:one: npm run config:one && cross-env BRAND=one ng build && ng run ng-dynamic-brand-ssr:server
scripts.serve:ssr:one: npm run config:one && cross-env BRAND=one node dist/ng-dynamic-brand-ssr/server/main.js
scripts.prerender:one: npm run config:one && cross-env BRAND=one ng run ng-dynamic-brand-ssr:prerender
scripts.start:two: npm run config:two && cross-env BRAND=two ng run ng-dynamic-brand-ssr:serve
scripts.build:two: npm run config:two && cross-env BRAND=two ng run ng-dynamic-brand-ssr:build
scripts.dev:ssr:two: npm run config:two && cross-env BRAND=two ng run ng-dynamic-brand-ssr:serve-ssr
scripts.build:ssr:two: npm run config:two && cross-env BRAND=two ng build && ng run ng-dynamic-brand-ssr:server
scripts.serve:ssr:two: npm run config:two && cross-env BRAND=two node dist/ng-dynamic-brand-ssr/server/main.js
scripts.prerender:two: npm run config:two && cross-env BRAND=two ng run ng-dynamic-brand-ssr:prerender
